alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:16AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Otero and western Bent Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 116 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cheraw, or 13 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Las Animas around 130 AM MDT. John Martin Reservoir around 135 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
